config.effect_countdown.group.warning_ef: The effects you should be warned about
config.effect_countdown.option.ignore_am: Whether ambient effects should be ignored (e.g. from beacons, conduits)
config.effect_countdown.option.ignore_hi: Whether hidden effects should be ignored
config.effect_countdown.option.warning_s: When the countdown should start in ticks (e.g. 10 seconds before = 200)
config.effect_countdown.option.warning_i: How often the tick sound should play during the countdown (e.g. once per second = 20)
config.effect_countdown.option.warning_s: The Sound ID to play as the tick sound (e.g. block.note_block.chime)
